DataListSpec.Name: Website Sponsorship Checkout Source Reps Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Used to populate the Ministry Rep source drop down on the sponsorship checkout page
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_WEBSITESPONSORSHIPCHECKOUTSOURCE_REPS (@CONTEXTID nvarchar(100)) as begin -- CONTEXTID is not currently used.
set nocount on;
declare @sources table ( SORTORDER tinyint, APPEALID uniqueidentifier, SOLICITORID uniqueidentifier, SOURCEDESC nvarchar(50) )
insert @sources values (1, '14E8838E-A89B-4481-8D8F-434E82EDC02E', 'B3C5677D-86F4-4B18-84A7-E2F31A2E928D', 'Candy Wigington'), (2, '6263FDBE-35ED-4211-A635-92B0D8F64F7D', '289FAF87-C584-4A2C-8114-03FE09DD37CD', 'Ben Rodgers')
select SORTORDER, APPEALID, SOLICITORID, SOURCEDESC from @sources order by SORTORDER end
